results.name: Square array T(a,n) read by antidiagonals: replace 2^i with a^i in binary representation of n, where a,n>=2.
comment: Sums of distinct powers of a. Numbers having only {0,1} in a-ary representation.
formula: G.f. of a-th row: 1/(1-x) * Sum{k>=0, a^k*x^2^k/(1+x^2^k) }.
Recurrence: T(a, 2n) = aT(a, n), T(a, 2n+1) = aT(a, n) + 1, T(a, 0)=0.
mathematica: Table[T[a-n+2, n], {a, 2, 13}, {n, 2, a}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 09 2021 *)
